Class PhotosTxFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.google.orkut.client.api.PhotosTxFactory

public class PhotosTxFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory to generate orkut photos related Transactions.

Author:
Shishir Birmiwal

updatePhoto

public UpdatePhotoTx updatePhoto(Photo photo)
Update the title of the given photo. The title is set in the photo using Photo.setTitle(String).

Returns:
an UpdatePhotoTx instance that updates the photo

deletePhoto

Deletes a photo on orkut.

Parameters:
photo - the photo to delete.
Returns:
a DeletePhotoTx instance to delete the photo

uploadPhoto

public UploadPhotoTx uploadPhoto(Album album,
                                 byte[] image,
                                 java.lang.String type,
                                 java.lang.String title)
Uploads a photo to an album on orkut.

Parameters:
album - the album in which to upload the photo
image - the image bytes
type - the type of the image
title - the title of the image
Returns:
a UpdatePhotoTx instance to upload the photo
